CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Schedule__c, 'Yes'), 1, 0) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Status_Reason__c , 'Escalates Quickly'), 2, 1) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Status_Reason__c , 'Frequent Caller'), 3, 1) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Status_Reason__c , 'Persistent Caller (7+ times per Week)'), 4, 1) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Status_Reason__c , 'Red - Escalated Service') , 1, 0) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Status_Reason__c , 'Red - Escalated Outage') , 2, 0) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Shift_Differentials__c, 'Yes') , 1, 0) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Benefit_Calculation__c, 'Yes') , 1, 0) + IF( ISPICKVAL( International_Client__c, 'Yes' ), 1, 0) + IF(ISNULL(Num_ID__c), 0, 1) + IF( ISBLANK(Integration__c), 0, 1) + IF( ISBLANK(My_Paychex_com__c), 0, 1) + IF( INCLUDES(Clock_Type__c, 'Barcode'), 1, (IF(INCLUDES(Clock_Type__c, 'Biometric'), 2, 0))) + IF( Num_C__c <= 10, 1, (IF(AND(Num_C__c >= 11, Num_C__c <= 20), 2, (IF(Num_C__c >= 21, 3, 0)))))
CustomField.label: Complexity Total
